summary: Evanescence is an American rock band formed in 1994 by Amy Lee and Ben Moody. Their first big success was the album "Fallen" in 2003, with hits like "Bring Me to Life." They won two Grammy Awards and sold millions of copies. After some lineup changes, their second album, "The Open Door," also did well. The band took a break but came back in 2015. They've since released more music, including "Synthesis" and "The Bitter Truth." Evanescence blends different music styles and has sold over 31 million albums, making them one of the biggest hard rock and metal bands.
title: Evanescence
